additionalTips.title: Additional Tips
contents: Remove the medication from packaging if the packaging is damaged
For tablets or capsules, place them on a contrasting background
Try scanning the barcode if visible on the package
If scanning fails, try taking a photo and uploading it instead

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
solutions: Try scanning from a different angle
Ensure nothing is obscuring the medication name
Clean your camera lens if it appears blurry
Check that you have a stable internet connection
Try manual search if scanning doesn't work

bestResults.title: For Best Results
bestResults.boxedMedications: For boxed medications: Scan the front panel with the medication name
bestResults.bottleMedications: For bottled medications: Scan the label with the medication name
bestResults.blisterPacks: For blister packs: Scan the foil side with printed information

privacy.title: Privacy Note
privacy.content: Your medication scans are processed securely. You can delete scan history at any time from your account settings.
